name: Squidy
description:
The year is 2042.
You're a the last  remaining  squid in the ocean.
Trash is everywhere, not a single fish on sight. Your goal is to
navigate through the garbage-filled waters, avoiding dangers
such as oil slicks and plastic waste.

Can you help the squid clean up the ocean and restore
balance to the underwater world?
Good luck, It will not be easy!

Squidy is a single-player game inspired by Flappy Bird.

Designer: Lila Egozy
Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan
Art & Interaction course, Gaming  major
Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
